Comment.val: /* Program to perform currency conversion calculation on the Amounts to approve */

Text.val: Attention! Index is needed for this task. Do not remove!
For the Foreign Currency the bank quotes are used.
For the account currency the market quotes are used, because that is the currency in which the SL will be calculated
Get the quotes per currency change
For the RepCurrency there is no bank/market price (is EUR for 99.9999% of the time)
Attention: Do not remove the Index!
